Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1976...
Traded from Lynchburg to Troy on 2/18/1976 (Going to LYN: P B. Mcateer. Going to TRO: P P. Twilley)...
Injured on 5/16/1976 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/10/1977 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/18/1977 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 5/1/1979...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
